Review.Contenu: I can understand cancelling and not fulfilling orders, but the passive aggressive responses from Justin afterwards and trying to shift blame onto people from OzBargain when the true fault is with Tithe.ly's IT and Marketing teams is really unprofessional.If their systems were good enough in the first place, something like this wouldn't have happened, and the lack of accountability makes things much worse.

Review.Titre: Do not buy from them, they do not ship order
Review.Contenu: They do not honor the orders, and do not refund either.they do not honor the promotions as they advertise it for.and then flag so many true genuine reviews for it, such as scummy behavior. - Face the reality you did not honor anything, and you falsely advertised promotions

I ordered some merch but they cancelled without notice. I just randomly logged in my account and saw my order was cancelled. No reason, no explanation and no communication at all. It's truly unprofessional and impolite way to treat customers.Edited to response to Tithy:"We replied to the email address submitted with every order (most of which were fake emails)"Stop lying. I didn't received any email even the spam folder. "This 1 star review is not a reflection of our products and services"Yes,it is. It's your fault in the first place but I don't see you take any responsibility or apologies for people's inconvenience and bad experience. In stead, you just blamed people for not having your consent and ordered. It's not a good service attitude and deserves 1 star.

Order was cancelled. I placed an order for a jacket and it was cancelled. I did receive order confirmation initally then it was cancelled. Do not recommend.I have no Idea what Ozbargain was until mentioned in this review. A friend of mine provided me with the code for a free jacket to support the app we use. Not my problem others are scammers. Once again it was cancelled without notification and it is not right having a discount code to your website and not honoring it. Does not matter now as we will probably not use the app in the future due to the bad experience. Thanks.

Review.Titre: A company making millions a month off…
Review.Contenu: A company making millions a month off brainwashed people but wont fill a fraction of their monthly profits fulfilling orders that took advantage of their own coupons.Edit: in response to tithe.ly response." the offer for a discount in our corporate swag store was posted to OzBargain without our consent or permission"Your permission is not needed to post about a promotion you're running."We received over 8000 orders that we simply were not able to fulfill"You make millions a month, you most definitely could have fulfilled the orders that were placed. But you don't actually care about what you can do, you only care about making as much money as you can from brainwashed people.Not very "god fearing" of you.Typical "christian company" being greedy af."This 1 star review is not a reflection of our products and services"Actually, it is a review of your company. Specifically your customer service and inability to follow through with promotions you offer. This review is completely justified. Bit weird that you'd try and paint me out to be some kind of liar, when this is based off my personal experienced with your company.Cope and seethe hypocrite.

Review.Titre: One star for freedom of speech
Review.Contenu: I am totally OK when they cancelled the order. But they have asked people to remove poor reviews, which is irritating. Looks like autocrats stopping anything against them. One star for this and thank you.

This company will scam you and take your money. They will not send an email about your order cancellation and will keep the hard earned money you spent on purchased items!!! Beware and take your money elsewhere!
Ordered cancelled without any explanation. Stay away from these guys.

Review.Titre: Beware, they do not honour their word!
Review.Contenu: Ran a promotion on their website which they did not honour. Now have my personal information. I believe this was a scam! Be careful when dealing with their dishonourable organisation.

Review.Titre: fraudulant company in the business of data collection
Review.Contenu: they hand out a discount code and cancels the order claiming it to be a fraud.  it was their fault, not ours.looks like fraud company in business of data mining / data collection

Placed an order after seeing promo on Threads app, ordered cancelled for “unforeseen circumstances.” This was disappointing, however the reason for order cancellation was fraud?? Not particularly “Christian” of this store, considering I also partly paid, and have yet to receive a refund.

If you are looking for any type of support from a company, look elsewhere. Their product is quite buggy, so I’ve had to contact support many times. (One of the times they sent out an email telling personal financial information to people who weren’t supposed to get it!) But their support is only available via message or scheduling a zoom call at least 24 hours in advance. When you send a message, they often take close to 24 hours to get back. Then if you don’t immediately respond, they close the ticket. It’s so frustrating.

We had someone donate over  $7000 through Tithly. Stripe has kept the funds over 10 days and has not released them to us or back to the donor. Stripe said the credit card was fraudulent. It was not and we have the donors lawyer and our lawyer involved. No one knows where the funds are. They’ve been taken from donors account but they are not in ours.  This is fraudulent and a scam. Tithely has been in touch but hasn’t done anything to get the funds and the donor has not received them back either.

I have had multiple instances where I've needed support for issues and their online chat people are not online during working hours.  It says they'll email you to help later but all they send is a copy of the chat log from a "noreply" email address.  Because of that I requested a call back from their customer support. It only gave me 3 options for call back times the next day so I picked one and put it in my calendar.  Customer support never called me during that time.  When I checked my email they had emailed me saying the time I chose didn't work for them and they never called me to help.  I can't do my job if their website doesn't provide the correct information in reports and their customer service department has no option to actually talk to someone who can help.12/29/22 Update:  I received an email from Kris Parker at Tithely regarding my review.  I was told that they've made changes to their supports ticketing system.  I wasn't given an answer as to why when I contact them during normal US business hours there's never a person available from their normal team or their Australia team to message you back.  The bot just tells you no one's available and they just can't help you.  I was also told they just have a very small support team so they can't guarantee if you schedule a meeting with them for support it will be kept.  If you have no refunds and don't need to see detailed reports for accounting then Tithely's system works fine.  I'm just saying if you need those detailed reports because Tithely just pulled a few hundred dollars out of your bank account for a refund but doesn't include that transaction in their systems report, because they just don't (still can't figure out why the cause for a negative "deposit" isn't included in reports), don't expect to be able to reach customer service for help.

Review.Titre: This evaluation is not due to you, but to me not knowing
Review.Contenu: This is not due to you. I am not sure what tithley is all about, so this is a rating on me.  Not all of us get informtion on tithly. I enter all of the donations into Breeze, we do on line giving through Breeze, but I don't  know how that relates to Tithe.ly. I am here only one day a week, as we have a 1/2 time pastor and a paid secretary one day a week. I used to be a voluntary secretary, but was asked not to volunteer, indirectly, saying a half time pastor only needs a secretary one day a week.

Review.Titre: Would rate much higher if you offered…
Review.Contenu: Would rate much higher if you offered the option of one consolidated deposit per week or perhaps twice a month. Having to book multiple, small deposits per week is a royal pain!

Review.Titre: I don't think it is as user friendly
Review.Contenu: I don't think it is as user friendly. It is harder to see what is pending.

Review.Titre: Incommunicado seems to be company culture.
Review.Contenu: In the normal course of business, Tithely works acceptably. However, if there is the slightest hiccup or adjustment required, it is utterly frustrating to resolve because they are exceedingly difficult to reach. This week I believe we have reached the finish line with them. Primarily because of the delay in reply to emails,  phone number disconnected and 24 hours wait for an appointment booked online. I’ve never dealt with them but I’ve never seen my team more exasperated by any singular vendor. None. We will do due diligence on customer service for next provider. Buyer beware.
The technology surrounding Breeze is relatively out of date and not very functional for a church of this size.
Past customer. Order unfulfilled, no communication regarding cancellation. Possibly data harvesting company. Recommend avoid.
Much of the platform is difficult to use though they have a great giving tool.

Review.Titre: The Tithe.ly program is not user friendly
Review.Contenu: The program is not user friendly at all.  Any time I have tried to donate I am unable to find the church I wish to donate to.  I can pull up my past givings and it will tell me the church but when I try to donate again it doesn't find the correct church.  There is no way to save the church name for future reference or giving and it does not give you the option to use your payment method one time.  They make you save your payment method and have all of your card information.  I think it is a good concept but very poorly designed.  Please make the app more user friendly and make finding a church easier.  I should not need to mess with my locations on my device and it shouldn't be any more difficult then typing in a few letters to bring up a list.
The worst support. The cost savings is not worth the support you have to deal with. Avoid it now so you don't regret it later.

Online giving is a great experience but there are those who give once or twice, then they cancel because of one thing or another. One reason I have heard is that they did not realize that the money was coming out weekly and did not account for it. I asked them if they knew how to balance a checking account or even a savings account. I also asked them if they read the information/instructions before signing up. I don't think they did.

I became the secretary July 1, 2022. The minister set me up but I still can’t get full access. He’s eft messages (no one answers the phone) with no response. He has asked if we could have another On Boarding and the church would be willing to pay for it. NO RESPONSE.

Review.Titre: one year in and we  still don't have…
Review.Contenu: one year in and we  still don't have two-way sync between tithely and elvanto. This was a big selling point for us and it's difficult to work around, but the remainder of the platform is good.

Review.Titre: We like the ease of giving on your…
Review.Contenu: We like the ease of giving on your phone but have struggled with getting info to synch across applications. It has been nice to have a texting option but that is not free.

Review.Titre: I can't really say much about our…
Review.Contenu: I can't really say much about our experience except that it's taking awhile to get started.

Review.Titre: The inability to get answers quickky…
Review.Contenu: The inability to get answers quickky and bot services that never seem to answer your question.

Review.Titre: Can be better in the user experience
Review.Contenu: Can be better in the user experience. Not very intuitive.

Review.Titre: Our church is too small for Tythly
Havent had time to take a good look of…
Review.Contenu: Havent had time to take a good look of services

Review.Titre: you dont keep to your promise

Review.Contenu: We would like better interaction between Elvanto and Tithely.
Higher service charge than other tithing options

Giving tool works well. They are too focused on business strategy and increasing customers, rather than on helping churches. They offer many products that have little value and aren't worth the cost or effort of using.
Too many integration failures.  Report filters are not flexible enough.

Review.Titre: We are just being to use Tithely

Review.Contenu: It's good but need to create demos on how to use your tools vandalism easy ways to transfer offerings to other countries

Review.Titre: It works well for most of our people…
Review.Contenu: It works well for most of our people accept when it doesn't. But by and large it's a decent app.
Tithely lacks so many things that churches need, from the printing of statements, to archiving groups, no ability to enter multiple transactions for one giver in one entry.

Review.Titre: Would love to see an overhaul on the Events platform....
Review.Contenu: This is specifically for Tithely Events....The Event platform is not very flexible actually creates more work for me.
Like convenience Dislike fees

Review.Titre: Unpolished and unorganized, but good value.
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly elvanto and breeze seem pretty siloed from each other and there are many situations where documentation they have link to other urls that no longer exist.  Yet if you're willing to learn it on your own these are the better tools than some that cost much more.

As I am reviewing several days after my experience, I cannot be as specific as I should. Working within the app can be confusing and I have to search through several tabs to find what I need. Working within the admin site is easier in some aspects, but frustrating in others. It’s easier as far as inputting membership info, but frustrating when trying to figure out how to input the church’s banking information.

Review.Titre: We are a small church and do not have…
Review.Contenu: We are a small church and do not have many that use this method of Tithing. Therefore I don't use all features of the program. However what I do use is very helpful. I like all the features and as we increase usage I'm sure they will be helpful. Great information is available with the system.

We're in Canada and I love the app. The banking end leaves a lot to be desired. It takes sometimes up to a week to end up in our account. An Interac eTransfer into our account happens instantly, with no fees. We're a small church, smaller community, elder congregation, and a few people use the app, but we are looking toward future growth being able to utilize more technology. Not sure if there is anymore you can do on your side to speed up transaction speed. God bless✝️
I quite like their services, however it is a little tough navigate (could be a little bit more user friendly) and the customization could be better.

I corresponded with other pastors about online giving during the Covid lockdown. I checked it out and was amazed to find out that Tithely Giving was available with the only costs being the fees paid per transaction. There was no subscription fee for using it. Tithely Giving has worked well for us.

Review.Titre: Easy to use, but could use some enhancements.
Review.Contenu: Easy to use, but could use some enhancements.They definitely need to add a "Memo" option to the giving to allow donors the ability to make a notation about their donation.

Review.Titre: Tithe.ly lets us offer online donations easily
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly does a great job of allowing our church to offer online contributions. It's easy to add new contribution funds and schedule deposit dates. The fees that are charged are reasonable and comparable to other credit card processing sites. My only complaint is that credit card and debit card transactions take different amounts of time to process - It's hard to get end of quarter donations processed in time for reports.

I'd like to preface with the fact that I am only able to speak to free utilities through Tithe.ly. Right now, my parish doesn't pay for any of the services. That being said, I think that Tithe.ly does a great job in organizing and making parish giving accessible and easy for those who wish to give. Our biggest compliment has been those who are overjoyed to set up a standard weekly donation towards the Church.I look forward to seeing all that we can do with Tithe.ly in the coming years, and how it can positively impact our parish.

Tithely has been an easy platform for our online giving. Although the services are budget friendly, more work could be done on the app management side. Also, I wish there were less integrations and add ons and more of a one system approach to all of the services.

Review.Titre: Good for Online Giving...Not Great Technical Support
Review.Contenu: Overall Tithe.ly is a good product for online giving. With the Elvanto integration, Tithe.ly allows you to connect your CHMS and Giving into one product (generally). However, we are not currently able to share "People" information between the 2 software platforms so it is almost like you have 2 different programs. ALSO, there is no phone number where you can just call for help! You have to deal with the robot and/or emails for technical help. That is the primary reason that I am giving Tithe.ly a 4 Star rating.

Review.Titre: Tithe is a great tool to use especially…
Review.Contenu: Tithe is a great tool to use especially when we have special events to collect funds for. Example: back to school clothing, Christmas giving for families in need. The only problem I had recently, my credit card expiration date expired. You should be able to pull up the card info and change the date to your new card.

I think it is fairly simple, it is just having that simplicity being understood across entire staff would be helpful. However, it is modern, and up to date with good stuff and easy use for church congregation.

Small Church Option We are slowly learning how to use the product.  It's hard for our church because we are mostly volunteers not skilled in technology and have such limited time.  Good education and support.
Using Tithe.ly as a giving option for our church has been a wonderful addition. While we have not utilized all of what Tithe.ly has to offer, we are very happy with what we have implemented.

Review.Titre: You are doing a commendable job
Review.Contenu: You are doing a commendable job. your teachings are helping many to do better and you are acting as an eye opener to church leaders to have a thorough understanding of what is required to be a good leader and how to increase in church membership

Review.Titre: Elvanto has been a great product over the years
Review.Contenu: We were onboard with Elvanto when it was first released in Australia.. since then we have seen a lot of new products added.  It is more geared toward intermediate users and would be good to see a slightly more user friendly product
We've been using tithe.ly for a few years now and it has helped streamline a lot of our processes. It's not for everyone as it itself requires a lot of admin to keep it ticking along.
As an administrator, Tithe.ly helps me to record all the offering/giving that comes in to the church and saves me a lot of time in organizing.
Apart from the system not keeping a record of the email for reference, the site is very easy to use.  So getting info is very quick. That I appreciate.
It's helpful for those who want to give online, who may be out of town, or are the younger generation.

Review.Titre: I like everything about the company
Review.Contenu: I like everything about the company, I just haven’t been able to utilize any of it yet since the setup takes a few weeks it seems.  Otherwise it seems promising.

Review.Titre: Tithe.ly has helped our church's communication.
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly has helped our church communication. It is a little on the slow side for me and I would like to be able to import between sites.
Makes giving easy, getting to the website versus the app isn't always the easiest but overall a good product.
In general, easy to use. Have not invested time to learn how to use more features of the product. Should find time to do that this year.

Review.Titre: The system is good but reaching…
Review.Contenu: The system is good but reaching customer service is a pain. I rarely ever get answers in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: It has made giving online easy to use…
Review.Contenu: It has made giving online easy to use and helped us be better stewards of our resources!
They could be 5 stars if they had better tools for worship teams and if they would make their App a bit more user friendly/intuitive.

Review.Titre: Tithely does  a good job of providing…
Review.Contenu: Tithely does  a good job of providing service even at the lowest level of congregation use.
Tithe.ly streamlines everything a church needs to manage its finances, social media, and people.

Review.Titre: Some times it is difficult to find the…
Review.Contenu: Some times it is difficult to find the name of the person who has donated, at least for me.
Growing company with work to do, but overall good product With TONS of potential.
Tithe.ly is a very useful tool to integrate and to make available to our congregation.
Your program made it easier for some of our givers to give more and to be more regular in their giving.  Thank you.
I love the integration between online giving and ChMS. We probably just need more personalized training.

Review.Titre: Website and app are easy to setup and…
Review.Contenu: Website and app are easy to setup and use even with no experience.

Review.Titre: Great tool for Tellers as well as Calendar events and member directory
Review.Contenu: About a third of our donors have migrated to Tithe.ly Giving from using envelopes. It is convenient can be done anywhere anytime even on vacations. The Tellers can see who donated and can get a summary of donations given for any period of time. No handling of cash as Tithe.ly will deposit it right into your church bank account. Tithe.ly will provide tax receipts that can be emailed directly to the donors or printed for paper copies. As a donor this info is available even from your smart phone. As a Teller, with admin privileges, you can view this from any PC or smart phone. Our church even records all envelope donations in Tithe.ly now.
Simple to implement and use giving platform for any church
The forms tool has been especially helpful for our church.
Donations collected sometimes take more than 10 days to be deposited.
Convenient to use but you pay for the convenience.
This product is good.  It does need some overhead, but once up and running it is a great tool.
Great for online giving. We really have found it conveniant and helpful.

Review.Titre: When I called for help I spoke with a…
Review.Contenu: When I called for help I spoke with a very helpful person.

I find it time consuming to take the deposits and compile a report for the month as to who gave what to which account. Our financial secretary needs it broken down plus we need it for our own books.  I now use the transaction feature and go through the month and write down the distribution.  Otherwise, I find it a great product especially for those who still cannot join us for in person worship
Great church management app.

Review.Titre: Was very easy to use Was very easy to use and navigate navigate
Review.Contenu: Was very easy to use and navigate

Review.Titre: Tithe.ly is a one stop shop
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly is a one stop shop that makes great for all ministries.  We love the platform and the ability to have everything at our fingertips.  The only thing we wish they'd change is that they don't listen to the customer completely.  We've been waiting on our app to be updated and completed so we can edit it ourselves since we enrolled and now we're almost a year in and still get the same response where they try to pass the issue to us.

Review.Titre: It is a great all-in-one program for…
Review.Contenu: It is a great all-in-one program for all parts of churching

Review.Titre: Online Giving is Good, Kiosk needs improvement
Review.Contenu: The online giving through Tithe.ly is working well.  However, there needs to be some improvement in the Kiosk application.  It should be able to accept a card scanner that would allow individuals to scan credit cards and not have to manually enter the information.  This is currently available for Tithe.ly Pay but not for the Kiosk giving application.

Our Church began using Tithe.ly last year during the pandemic. It took a while for people to trust this new option but now they have embraced the process.It has certainly helped us  to have money available to pay the operating expenses for the Church.Some members use it weekly, others once a month.I am the treasurer for our Church.
It’s simple to use however the fees are little high

Review.Titre: Your new tithely 2.0 is not all it’s…
Review.Contenu: Your new tithely 2.0 is not all it’s cracked up to be having problems with the giving statements tab. If you want to know the whole story you call send me a email with a phone number to talk to a person live. I will not deal with your bot or talk about it through a email.[Update]After giving my first review a one star I am updating my review to its current 4 star. Tithely contacted me and I had a phone call with a human being and not a {Bot}, they were able to fix the problem I was having. So I felt it was only right to let everyone know that they fixed the problem I was having.

Review.Titre: Made giving easier and more consistent
Great Option For Online and Mobile Giving
Review.Contenu: We have been using Tithe.ly for a 3 years now and can highly recommend. The on-boarding process was simple and even our most tech challenged users have been able to utilize. It isn't perfect but they continue to improve and listen to customer needs. If you're looking to get on track with online giving checking out Tithe.ly is a must.
Your website is not real friendly when it comes to looking for donations that where sent to us. I do like the statements each month.

Review.Titre: I have not had a problem using Tithe-ly…
Review.Contenu: I have not had a problem using Tithe-ly as an Administrator, but several of our church members have stated that they find it confusing to use for their donations. I personally do not use it for my donations so cannot say one way or the other.Many of the offers for viral meetings concerning Tithe-ly are not useful to our small church needs. Over all I think it is a good service, just disappointed that more of our members do not use it during this time of need with the pandemic.

Review.Titre: Tithely  makes it super easy to give…one change only.
Review.Contenu: Tithely  makes it super easy to give and communicates well with me through email.  The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because sometimes when switching payments it's hard to determine if the app is charging me at the moment or if it will wait for my scheduled recurring payment.  Really appreciate all the support that comes to me as a minister as well.  They deliver well thought out content.

Perhaps I am missing something, but I wish there was a simple way to get a listing of who has given and in what amount. I am referring here to an all-encompassing document that would put this together for "at-a-glance" evaluation and record-keeping.Otherwise, we are very please with the ease of this system!

I appreciate the way Tithe.ly interacts the way it does with their customers and is constantly making improvements to it's service. There are two areas that I feel can be places to consider for enhancements. 1. I'm not sure that you have any control over this first area. There are deposits that the church has received that takes much as ten days to be deposited in our account. 2. The reporting is a little labor intensive to get the information I'm looking for. We should be able to select which information we want to download. Maybe this is a learning curb in my end. I'm not sure.

Review.Titre: They have been very good to work with…
Review.Contenu: They have been very good to work with and the service is good.  I didn't do a 5 because there have been times when I have run in to trouble and it has been a glitch on their end.  So I think there are some bugs to work out from time to time.  Tim was extremely helpful with our set up of the App. We are enjoying the app and the online pay.   Liz

Review.Titre: No need to hesitate. Just signup, install it and go!
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly is a quick and easy way to provide online giving to any church, regardless of size or challenges. It has honestly been a huge help to us during the pandemic. It also allowed those who normally don't attend or contribute to our church to do so!

We are a small and not financially gifted Church. We have not had a 'collection' as part of our service for a long time and more and more we had noticed that people did not bring money to church to put in the plate provided. With the increased use of cards and the decline in the use of cheques people were finding it harder to give. Introducing the congregation to Tithe.ly has made it very easy for all our folks who are on line. We still have one or two who are not tech minded for whom to find a solution. But overall we are very pleased with the ease of use and the enthusiasm of most of our Church.

The giving app is very useful. Easy to modify what data you can view. All the information you need is there. Easy to give and instruct others how to give. Works smoothly and I have enjoyed using it regularly.

Review.Titre: We are just about to launch our church…
Review.Contenu: We are just about to launch our church app and are happy with how the process has gone.  Tithe.ly has quick turn around times when making changes and they have lots of resources (video & articles) when questions arise. Would like to see more editing option on the app dashboard and improved analytics are in the works so that is nice.Haven't used the giving side much yet so don't have a lot of feedback on that platform but that should change after the app launch. Also just getting into the ChMS software use and like the overall offering and the resources available.Very friendly and efficient support staff!

Review.Titre: I would have given 5 stars except for…
Review.Contenu: I would have given 5 stars except for the fact that we still can't give via Tithely from a bank account here in Australia. We can only give using credit cards which have higher fees. Elvanto is great and improving all the time.

Review.Titre: Tithely has lots of great features for…
Review.Contenu: Tithely has lots of great features for the church.
Reliable way of online giving, easy and effective.

Review.Titre: Love both versions of the tithe-ly app
Review.Contenu: Love both versions of the tithe-ly app, after finally getting things straightened out. Tech Support is the best I've experienced with app development, especially during these trying times. I hope they will be a little more willing to just talk for a time, rather than email and answer questions by chat for days on end. I did get a phone call appointment, finally, but again, I hope this is different when things settle down in the future. I understand the need for fees with the Free tithe-ly app, however, for those of us who decide to spend right at $60 a month for the church app, I would Love to see those fees waved for financial transaction.Again, we love the tithe-ly church app.

Review.Titre: Tithe.ly has been great all the way…
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly has been great all the way around. From the giving platform to the app we love it. I get calls all the time from other pastors asking us who we use and we proudly tell them. The customer service is solid also.
Although I'm still learning and adjusting to the Engagement Platform. I think it's great and when I find myself stuck in completing a task the help I receive via customer service has been awesome.

Overall, we love Tithe.ly. We do not use all of its features, but the basic giving functuon is great. I o ly have 2 suggestions:1) Figure out a way for ACH transactions to be deposited more quickly. This is the one thing that prevents us from closing our books each month, as we have to wait for the deposits (so they will match up with those on the bank statemets). At the same time, we prefer to push ACH payments so people do not use credit cards to co tribute more than they can really afford.2) fins a way to hide or delete, even in the background) unused or obsolete giving types. We have had a lot of them and the list is getting too long, for no good reason. Many of ours could be deleted. Maybe there is a way to delete them, but I have not seen it.

Review.Titre: The only issue I have is the time limit…
Review.Contenu: The only issue I have is the time limit of 7 or 8 days on bank transactions.  Even when the bank is when the giver is using the same bank.  I would say that banks need to be more responsive.

I've been very pleased with the Tithe.ly platform. We started using it in 2018 and it helped us to engage our members, attenders, and guests with a simple and safe way to connect in giving. We've seen an increase in giving and in reoccurring givers since implantation. When COVID-19 changed our ministry plans and gathering options, having Tithe.ly already in place helped us maintain our level of giving and allowed us to set up a way for people to partner with us to meet COVID-19 needs. There have been a couple of areas that I've talked with Tithe.ly about that would better meet the church's needs, they have been very open to listen and have worked through them with us. I appreciate their ministry mindset and partnership with advancing the gospel of Jesus.

Review.Titre: Tithe.ly is a great tool for church giving
Review.Contenu: We really like Tithe.ly and the options available to customize things for our church and congregation. I personally use the bank deposit option the most to gather the data to put in our financial program. With the change to the new version, it sadly has made it a little more difficult to get to the full information of the giver. In the previous version, everything was on one screen including the name, the amount given, the amount of the fee charged and the amount actually deposited into the bank account. It also gave me the date the transaction was initiated. Now, however, I have to click on three different options per transaction to get that information and still have to calculate what was actually given. It's not as big of a deal if one person gives per day but with multiples, it gets a bit sticky. That would be my only thing that holds me back on the 5th star.

Review.Titre: Tithe.ly is such an easy way to give.
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly is such a great way for our congregation to give conveniently and consistently.  It also allows those who watch online to have a way to be connected and to give as well.

Review.Titre: Good app but could be better
Review.Contenu: The giving shows everything as tithe however a lot is not a tithe but giving of offerings. I appreciate being able to give automatically since my retirement is automatically entered into my bank so I don't really think about it. I'm hoping there is a way to see the amounts I've given all year. Thank you very much!

Great start with the Tithe.ly with whom we had a chat about our needs and how Tithe can answer them. The team is very honest about what it can do and it can’t.Pricing is very competitive compared to other solution especially in EU and French as a language. Still learning and testing

Review.Titre: One of the better Church Management…
Review.Contenu: One of the better Church Management system. Still needs a bit more tweaking and have a good user experience but still works great overall.

Review.Titre: tithe.ly allowed us to give to other…
Review.Contenu: tithe.ly allowed us to give to other churches besides our home church.

Review.Titre: Tithely is the tool needed for simplified giving
Review.Contenu: Tithely is a simple tool to use for online giving and has given us the ability to accept online giving from early on in our church planting days.  I really appreciate what Tithely has provided us.

Review.Titre: Tithe.ly is easy to use and I was able…
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly is easy to use and I was able to tithe weekly, biweekly, or monthly. If I needed to stop a payment it was easy with no hassle.
We are still in the early stages of using Tithe.ly and learning all it offers...but initial thoughts are positive

Review.Titre: Company who is still innovating which…
Review.Contenu: Company who is still innovating which is what is needed in 2023

Review.Titre: Tithe.ly has met most of our…
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly has met most of our expectations and been extremely helpful. As a small congregation, we purchased with the vision that we would grow into the opportunities that exist.

Review.Titre: We love tithe.ly for its user friendly…
Review.Contenu: We love tithe.ly for its user friendly interface. Only downside is the fee for processing transactions.

Review.Titre: Great program, but can be difficult to master
Review.Contenu: Highly capable program, very customisable, but isn't very intuitive and has taken years for our team to get the hang of.
Tithe.ly makes it easy for people to give!

Review.Titre: Has it's limits but is overall pretty good
Review.Contenu: Great for bringing structure to church admin

Review.Titre: Tithely is a good all around solution…
Review.Contenu: Tithely is a good all around solution for online giving and event registration.  We even process RSVPs for dinners and small group sign ups through their event registration suite.  I'd like to see some improvement there, but overall, they've been a great company to work with!
Solid digital giving solution with reasonable rates.
Tithe.ly is a useful tool for keeping track of our donors and providing a safe online way for congregants to give to the ministry. It has made the task of keeping track of ministry donations easier.
Easy to use web and app. Able to spend less time doing rosters, and more time planning for and engaging with worship team.
It does serve what our church is after especially in analyzing and producing various reports.  Also the use of calendar is fantastic.

The resources are good - a little bit money centred however. Well organised information for people management but not very good for large scale youth and childrens ministry integration. Forms are great!

Review.Titre: I think the system works well
Review.Contenu: I think the system works well! Younger people are more apt to use it! But we one of the older people in our congregation using it.
its a easy co.to work with!
I like Tithely. They're simple, cheap, and easy.
We switched from a major donation platform because Tithe.ly allows donors to cover the fees. Our donors appreciate that...and so do we!

Overall a great application that continues to improve and expand in its capacity. There are a few bugs here and there, but we have generally been happy with our experience. It has certainly saved us valuable time!

Review.Titre: Tithely is very straight forward from an admin point of view
Review.Contenu: Tithely is such a great platform for online giving.  It is easy to use and user-friendly. I am the administrator at my church and looking up deposits and giving by users is very straight forward and easy to understand. I only wish there was the ability to create custom reports and easier ways to search back a year or two than just scrolling through every single gift.

While I would prefer to speak with someone immediately, having the chat is helpful (get rid of the BOT), and the team members usually respond via email within 24 hours.   Not having immediate help when there is a challenge proves troublesome.
Tithe.ly is an incredible convenience for donors!

Review.Titre: Tithely is very easy to use
Review.Contenu: Tithely is very easy to use. When I have had questions, the support personnel have always been extremely helpful in answering questions and resolving the issue.
Very easy to setup. Support is great if you need help.
Working with Tithe.ly has been a very good experience and the new Tithe.ly 2.0 reports have been great. I like the idea of marking the bank deposit as reconciled, that has been MORE THAN HELPFUL!

Justin is a great rep. While there was an honest mistake with a coupon code that was shared too widely, you still did a good job handling the situation.Ignore the recent 1-star reviews. They were trying to take advantage of an open $100 coupon with no minimum spend that circulated to one of Australia’s largest bargain sites, with thousands of orders coming out as $0. This resulted in orders being cancelled - completely understandable.Keep up the good work!

Review.Titre: Recent 1-star-ers knew what they were getting into
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly ran a low-key merch promotion that was shared without their knowledge on a large Australian bargain community. Consequently it was abused to the fullest, with mention of some users even creating multiple accounts to double-dip. The result was thousands of orders at the cost of $0 to bargain hunters.Rep Justin has been super responsive on the site, and gone through all the right steps to explain the honest mistake. He's stayed respectful in spite of the shameful behaviour of some entitled people in the comments.Thank you Justin!
I receive an email to let me know when funds have been  sent to our church. It is a reminder for me to look and follow the information into our bank. It is greatly appreciated.

This platform option for our church gives them the opportunity to give other than most traditional methods.  It is used mostly when the individual for what ever reason can not make it to church.  Then on-line giving gives them an option to give while they are away, or another means to give.During our Stewardship Sunday we have encouraged our member and visitors to use this more as they get used to the cyber way of life.

Review.Titre: Affordable and Pretty much any application you need to…
Review.Contenu: Pretty much any application you need to effectively operate a church is there at a price that does not change or increase when the congregation increases. The giving and website apps are amazing and simple to setup and use. service planning and volunteer apps are on par with other services.  The real ticket is they bundle it all together where others don't.

Review.Titre: Tithely Values us as a Church
Review.Contenu: Over the last year and half I have build a relationship with Tithely and feel they value our church.

Review.Titre: All-access gives us everything we need…
Review.Contenu: All-access gives us everything we need and more.  There are so many things that we have not gotten around to using all the applications Tithely offers.  Customer service is always great with very timely responses.  We are in the process of holding a seminar for other churches in our association to show them how we use Tithely so they can replicate our success.

Review.Titre: Tithe.ly makes it easy for our people…
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly makes it easy for our people to give financially through electronic means whether it is the first time, or in a recurring format. In a mobile culture, having the option to give from anywhere at any time is a blessing to our congregation and church.

Honestly, Tithe.ly has been a great addition to our church profile.  Our online giving has increased, and the church app has helped us get announcements out to the congregation and also given us the opportunity to put sermon outlines up for anyone with the app.
Tithe.ly All-Access has helped our church bring all aspects of church management under one umbrella. It’s user friendly and support staff are always knowledgeable and quick to respond.

Review.Titre: I did a ton of research on online…
Review.Contenu: I did a ton of research on online giving platforms for our church, and consistently found Tithe.ly to exceed all the other programs for many reasons. We love their low fees and that they do not hassle us with sales calls like some other platforms out there. Tithe.ly is easy to use and has exponentially increased our giving.

Being fairly new at my job as an admin, Breeze makes my job easier in terms of having all information at one place. This year was my first time creating contribution letters and it was not hard at all.

Tithe.ly is an excellent platform for giving, education, planning and engaging. We have moved our website to this platform and are currently working on our App and the team has made it a seamless transition. We are excited for our future utilizing this platform.

Review.Titre: Never Short Change. On Time Every Time
Review.Contenu: I found that giving through Tithe.ly helps me in better control my budget and I will not have to miss out a giving day if I can’t attend church on a particular weekend. I’m this way, the church will also have a better assurance its budget estimation.
Our church uses Tithely for online giving and communications (email newsletters). We have no issues with their systems and have peace of mind in spending money on services designed for churches.

Review.Titre: Everything is working well so far
Review.Contenu: Everything is working well so far!  No issues!All the people that I have dealt with have been very friendly & helpful.

Review.Titre: Tithe.ly has helped our church automate…
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly has helped our church automate giving in all areas much easier! We use it for tithes and offerings as well as shirt orders, children church event giving as well as missions and outreach
Tithely has always performed well as an online giving tool and is easy to use from both an administrative and user side.  I am impressed by their forward looking plans.

Review.Titre: Tithe.ly is a giving tool our church
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly is a giving tool our church started using right before Covid hit. We are grateful to have expanded to full access. (App, Media , CMS and Website)

Our church only uses the online giving tool as of now, but Tithe.ly has helped save us so much time on our giving! Once our little church grows we plan on expanding into their other tools as well! Highly recommend!

Tithley makes church management so much easier -- especially in tracking the giving. As a smaller, events-driven ministry with most of our events being virtual, we have been so grateful for the amazing services provided by tithely.

For us having an integrated system for database management, community communications, creating and hosting our website and app as well as manage our giving has been an essential part of growing in online mission. We'd recommend Tithe.ly all access to any ministry or mission team who are needing extra support in these areas and value quality.

Our church was unsure of where to start with creating an app, but if you follow the steps given by tithely they make it very simple.From start to finish we had the shell of our app in a matter of a week.

Review.Titre: They have been a great and timely help…
Review.Contenu: They have been a great and timely help for us. As the landscape of church has changed, they have allowed us to continue moving forward without complications.

Review.Titre: Platform has truly transformed the way our church operates.
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly Church Giving & Engagement Platform has truly transformed the way our church operates. It's an absolute game-changer! The seamless giving experience, impressive features, user-friendly interface, comprehensive reporting, and exceptional customer support make Tithe.ly stand out from the crowd. If you're searching for a reliable and efficient platform to enhance your church's giving and engagement, look no further.
We love Tithely. We love the giving options, the ease in building and maintaining our website, and we love the app. We used another service prior and are very satisfied with the switch.
We mainly use the ACH deposit part of the program, but they have so much more to offer! Set up and use of the program for our church is pretty easy! Customer service for the program is great too!

Review.Titre: Tithely user for 5+ years & love it!
Review.Contenu: Been using tithely for 5+ years and we have absolutely loved the services and products offered as well as the customer service. Definetly beneficial to all of our ministries.

Review.Titre: Tithe.ly helps some of our givers to…
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly helps some of our givers to assist our ministry in a way that is very convenient in today's world. This avenue has opened the door for new contributions for our church.

Review.Titre: Tithely is a great all-in-one program…
Review.Contenu: Tithely is a great all-in-one program that allows churches to organize everything into spot.  Tech support is very helpful and friendly.  Great for simple starter apps and websites!

Review.Titre: Happy to be learning about tithely
Review.Contenu: Still trying out tithely and learning about its capabilities, but what we’ve seen and used sfo far has been very helpful

Review.Titre: Survey was clear and easy to complete
Review.Contenu: Survey was clear and easy to complete.  Tithe.ly always presents as caring, competent and complete as a service to help people worship God through giving.

Honestly, the only article that tithe.ly help me with is about the importance of church budgeting. The reasons why it is necessary to have an annual budget in church. So far it is so good and we already do it. And I'm still reading your email until now.  Thank you

Review.Titre: A great service for small churches
Review.Contenu: A great service for small churches. We got it integrated into our website and now have online giving without a huge monthly cost.

Review.Titre: Easy to sign up and use
Review.Contenu: Easy to sign up and use - we use Tithe.ly as an add-on to enable easy giving.Would be good to be able to take direct debit from bank accounts (in Australia) and not just card though ...
Tithe.ly is a system-wide pleasure to use — it’s simple, the pricing is straight-forward and it’s more than capable capacity and bandwidth provide ample usability
With tithe.ly we are able to connect to a wider audience, especially during covid.It makes church more accessible.
It’s more convenient for our members who use online banking & prefer not writing checks or handling cash.
Thank you so much for creating a web page source where we can design our personal church website and keep connected with our congregation and those seeking a new church in our area!
Tithely is a great way for parishioners to give money easily and anonymously. I like that I can give automatically on a monthly basis.

Review.Titre: It is important to use Tithley for an easy way to give.
Review.Contenu: Using Tithley is very helpful for the church staff to know how much they are receiving to be able to meet their budget.

Review.Titre: Tithe.ly has definitely helped us manage Church better.
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly has definitely helped us manage Church life better which allows us to get on with caring/outreach of people.
Tithely has made giving much easier for those who do not carry cash or checks. We have seen a more steady stream due to the decrease in effort it takes to give to the church.

Elvanto may not be intuitive at first, and I highly recommend that the church staff responsible for overseeing the ChMS software and website are relatively tech-savvy. However, the features provided by Tithely are in-depth and helpful. Tithely is still growing and changing which can be scary to users, but the support team has always been helpful in answering questions and explaining the functions available. Tithely also communicates its changes very clearly and makes sure its users can use what it provides. This is a one-stop hub for church giving, our website, our newsletter, and ministry scheduling; before, our congregation was using 4 separate hosts, and having it all consolidated into one integrated system is so helpful. I do sincerely recommend Tithely, and encourage anyone struggling to decipher the ins and outs of it to reach out to its awesome support team.

Review.Titre: Tithe.ly has improved our bottom line…
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly has improved our bottom line by lowering the cost of giving for our members and by providing a much lower cost for a website.

Review.Titre: Tithe.ly is truly the easy button for...
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly is truly the easy button for online giving and rapid communication with our congregation. Event registration is also made really simple. Highly recommend
This is a great app. I've used other website builders but this is perfectly tailor for churches. All the apps are easy to set up and they have a great customer service team.
We use Elvanto as our church software - and it is an excellent tool to plan services, manage our communications and keep track of people movement.
They usually return calls or emails within a short frame of time and can resolve issues quickly.
Tithely was easy to establish and integrate with our online platforms. It also has an easy user interface.

Review.Titre: This is one of the best kept secrets…
Review.Contenu: This is one of the best kept secrets in church giving/donations management. It is easy to use and set up. Looks and works great. Absolutely recommend you give it a try.
Very good service, easy to use, great product, no problems, no hassles, excellent support when needed.
Very glad we chose Tithely. It is easy to use and a very effective way to manage giving to our organization.

Review.Titre: I love this tool to understand and…
Review.Contenu: I love this tool to understand and asking about we can approve more in our church I really appreciate it

Review.Titre: I love the precision and speed of…
Review.Contenu: I love the precision and speed of reporting and incorporating the data into our bookkeeping software.  Tithe.ly does it right!
The cost is straight forward. The button was very simple to add to our website. Customer Service has always helped.

Review.Titre: Tithely has helped me consistently in my giving.
Review.Contenu: Tithely has helped me to do a better job of meeting my desire to be faithful in my giving.
I really like that fact that the monies are put straight into our checking account.  Love the way, I can check to see what has been put in each week.  Tithely is a great program

Review.Titre: Breeze has become a key asset for those…
Review.Contenu: Breeze has become a key asset for those of us who work in membership, program management and finance.
Most all are consistent givers, it doesnt rely on the giver being in person to donate.

Review.Titre: No cost to church to use
Review.Contenu: No cost to church to use. For younger engagement, this is a great tool as many people do not carry checks and/or cash on a regular basis. Easy set up for church, too.
We use Tithely with our church. It is a convenient way to schedule regular tithing.

Review.Titre: It is easy to understand  for the team…
Review.Contenu: It is easy to understand  for the team and our members.  My only hitch is when I would like to talk with someone on the phone instead of in  the message area.  At times I have a problem there.

Review.Titre: Tithe.ly has been great for our team
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly has been great for our team. After trying a few other we found tithely as the best church management software.

Review.Titre: We just started using Tithe ly
Review.Contenu: We just started using Tithe ly. Has worked well and made treasurers job easier

Review.Titre: Using Tithe.ly has been great and easy
Review.Contenu: Using Tithe.ly has been great and easy. This app has been helpful when I need to directly tithe to my church. It also helps our office staff cut down on time spent counting money.
This program has made it easy for us to invoice churches for combined youth retreats.
This is a great team, Yes without tithing a church cannot grow to its maximum.

Review.Titre: Tithely is the easiest way to give
Review.Contenu: Tithely is the easiest way to give. You don’t have to remember your check book or if you go out of town or are home sick, it’s in!
Customer service always responds quickly and is extremely helpful! Their app is a wonderful tool to help communicate and encourage our body!

Review.Titre: Easy to use for the administrator and…
Review.Contenu: Easy to use for the administrator and the tithers! Always helpful for questions and just getting started

Review.Titre: They do a great job of addressing…
Review.Contenu: They do a great job of addressing issues and helping us solve problems.
Tithly is a wonderful service. It helps keep all our giving organized.

Review.Titre: The products are received on time and…
Review.Contenu: The products are received on time and they are applicable to the current church ministry

Review.Titre: Giving is made easier with an online…
Review.Contenu: Giving is made easier with an online platform. Tithley helps with that.

Review.Titre: Tithe.ly makes giving easy and fun!
Review.Contenu: I appreciate the Tithe.ly platform. Has a church plant it’s made it easy for us to focus on the people and not the giving!
Appreciate the work of Tithely. The program has been frets for our ministry.
Tithe.ly is a great tool for churches to manage their online giving.  They make it easy for our church body to give and for us to track giving each month!
Great customer service and support. Their website builder and email communications are top-notch. The giving platform is very solid.

Review.Titre: This platform is cost effective and…
Review.Contenu: This platform is cost effective and user friendly for a variety of services we need for our non-profit organization.
Awesome, Tithe.ly, helps to make the business end of our ministry so much easier.

Review.Titre: Great avenues of record keeping for…
Review.Contenu: Great avenues of record keeping for church giving. Simple and thorough.

Review.Titre: Tithe.ly is VERY helpful when answering…
Review.Contenu: Tithe.ly is VERY helpful when answering emails.I enjoy the look of our website.
tithely is very easy to use and a great way to set up giving especially for salary.

Review.Titre: I have found Tithely easy to navigate…
Review.Contenu: I have found Tithely easy to navigate and helpful for online giving.
Great resources that is easily applied to our day to day activities.
Efficient, user friendly and a cheerful experience in giving in a fast paced world
Tithe.ly offers an intuitive online giving platform that so many of the younger generation appreciate. They offer an amazing product.

Review.Titre: Tithely is easy to use and saves my…
Review.Contenu: Tithely is easy to use and saves my organization so much time.
Easy to use app that makes giving simple and even helps with reminders.
Excellent products. Time saving and easy for our church members to use.

Review.Titre: I love learning new ideas of making…
Review.Contenu: I love learning new ideas of making life more effective especially with social media.
Incredible service. Every church should be using Tithely.
Easy to work with. Assistance given readily when asked for
For online giving, you can't find a better program.
